field.name: If child is breastfed, breastfeed more frequently and for longer at each feed. If child is taking breast-milk substitutes, increase the amount of milk given
Increase other fluids. For example, give soup, rice water, coconut water, fruit juice or clean water.
Giving extra fluid can be lifesaving. Give fluid according to Plan A or Plan B on the TREAT THE CHILD char
Advise the mother to give 1 or 2 extra feeds per day for 2 weeks after the child gets better
